about_the_game:
In Freestyle Exile, you play as August, an elite skateboarding assassin in the seedy underworld. 15 years ago, your father was disgraced and tarnished his reputation in the assassin community. You're trying to set things right, by competing in the underworld's most popular game show!

Features

  • Several movement options allowing for open-ended traversal
  • Evil Villain that constantly makes fun of you
  • Skateboard-based combat system
  • Full controller support

content_descriptors.notes: This game features cursing and references to drug use. There is also cartoon violence.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Storage: 220 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Storage: 220 MB available space

name: Freestyle Exile Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 220 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

You're trying to set things right, by competing in the underworld's most popular game show!
